description: Defines a Flutter widget called BoardTile, which represents a single tile in a Tic Tac Toe game board. It includes styling, touch handling, and visual states for displaying X or O values.

classes.name: BoardTile
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing a single stylized tile in the Tic Tac Toe game board with tap handling.

methods.name: _symbolColor
methods.description: Determines the color of the X or O symbol based on the current value and theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BoardTile, including styling, ripple effect, and displaying the symbol.
